title: Arkansas freshman infielder enters transfer portal
description: Arkansas lost its fifth player thus far to the current transfer portal cycle on Friday when freshman infielder Gabe
excerpt: Arkansas lost its fifth player to the transfer portal on Friday.
text: Arkansas lost its fifth player thus far to the current transfer portal cycle on Friday when freshman infielder Gabe Fraser announced on Instagram that he was entering his name in. The 6-foo-2 California native appeared in 28 games for the Hogs in 2025 and recorded 13 hits with a double, triple, home run and 12 RBI in 52 at-bats while slashing .250/.339/.365. Along with Fraser, former Razorbacks currently in the transfer portal include pitchers Tag Andrews, Luke Williams, Ross Felder and Jackson Farrell. Be sure to follow along at The Trough premium message board for more coverage of Arkansas' postseason and inside information on the Razorbacks' transfer portal recruiting.
html:
Arkansas lost its fifth player thus far to the current transfer portal cycle on Friday when freshman infielder Gabe Fraser announced on Instagram that he was entering his name in.

The 6-foo-2 California native appeared in 28 games for the Hogs in 2025 and recorded 13 hits with a double, triple, home run and 12 RBI in 52 at-bats while slashing .250/.339/.365.

Along with Fraser, former Razorbacks currently in the transfer portal include pitchers Tag Andrews, Luke Williams, Ross Felder and Jackson Farrell.

Be sure to follow along at The Trough premium message board for more coverage of Arkansas' postseason and inside information on the Razorbacks' transfer portal recruiting.
